title: Carl Weber's The Family Business: New Orleans
overview: Welcome to a new branch of the Duncan family tree, known for their popular casino / nightclub â€˜Midnight Blues' where tourists, titans of industry, and trap kings & queens party side-by-side. But the club also holds secrets so dark that it could turn the vibrant city of New Orleans upside down. Facing threats at every turn, the Duncans try to keep their family safe and put their complicated pasts to the side for the greater good of their enduring legacy in the NOLA.
